info.name: No Logo Shadow - Tumblr
info.description: Removes the dark shadow from the new logo.
info.additionalInfo: Does what it says on the tin, removes the shadow from the new logo. ----- Install the No Small Logo Shadow userstyle to get rid of the small shadow as well! Install the Declutter Series userstyle to make full advantage of the spare space created by the recent update! Install the No Logo Animation userstyle to get rid of the logo's flashing rainbow animation as well! If there's anything else that needs to be fixed, let me know on Tumblr!
